title: r/Chodi: "India needs to eliminate Muslims", "India without Muslims, that’s the dream", "India should learn Xinjiang treatment from China" casually talking about genociding 200 Million Indian Muslims.

author: magistrate101
text: Remember to report these directly to the admins.

author: RubenMuro007
text:
1. Three dots on the top right.
2. Click Report
3. Click “Hate”

Boom!

author: rasalghularz
text:
Thank you
But can we report an entire subreddit instead of one post?

author: catherinecc
text: Why? They aren't going to do anything.
